actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require that the Federal reserve banks shall keep verbatim transcripts of all meetings of their boards of directors and make them public under certain limitations.
short_title: Federal Reserve System Public Information Act

summary.text: Federal Reserve System Public Information Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require that Federal Reserve banks keep verbatim transcripts of all meetings of their boards of directors. Requires such transcripts be delivered to Congress without deletion. States that the transcripts shall also be released to the general public with specified deletions permitted.

titles.title: Federal Reserve System Public Information Act
A bill to require that the Federal reserve banks shall keep verbatim transcripts of all meetings of their boards of directors and make them public under certain limitations.
